message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,400,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our ongoing negotiation, $1,300,000 doesn't quite meet my minimum requirements. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This reflects a significant compromise on my end, and I believe it remains a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,325,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be within your acceptable range while still being fair to my budget.
